summary: An unique jewelry based on Standing Stones titles.
descriptionHtml:
[i][b][center][/center][left][i][b][/b][/i][/left][/b][/i][i][b][left][i][b][/b][/i][/left][/b][/i][b][u][color=#000000][b][u][color=#000000]
[/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#000000]Adds a ring and necklace for every standing stone.The items can not be disenchanted.
The jewelry can be bought if you have enough money :) at vendor Sebastian at entrance of Kilkreath Temple.
[/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#000000]

1. Apprentice stone -[/color][/u][/b]
[/color][/u][/b][size=3][i]Necklace - [/i]Fortified Alchemy And Smithing by 30 pts
[i]Ring - [/i]All skills Increase 7% Faster[/size]

[b][u][color=#000000]2. Lady Stone - [/color][/u][/b]
[size=3][i]Necklace -[/i] Restoration fortified by 25 pts,Fortified magicka by 25pts and magicka reg. by 10%
[i]Ring - [/i]Fortified Speechcraft And Lockpick by 30 pts[/size]


[color=#000000][b][u]3. Atronach Stone - [/u][/b][/color]
[size=3][i]Necklace [/i]- Resist magick 15%,illusion and alteration fortified by 45 pts.
[i]Ring - [/i]Resist magic 15% Spell Range And Duration Increased[/size]

[b][u][color=#000000]4. Lord Stone - [/color][/u][/b]
[size=3][i]Necklace - [/i]fortified Health by 50pts And One Handed Skill by 50 pts
[i]Ring -[/i] Health Reg.Increased by 10% And Carry Capacity by 70 pts[/size]

[color=#000000][b][u]5. Lover Stone - 
[/u][/b][/color][size=3][i]Necklace -[/i]  Fortified Health by 30 pts and health reg. by 30%
[i]Ring -  [/i]Opposite sex damage Increased by 6%[/size]

[b][u][color=#000000]6. Mage Stone - [/color][/u][/b]
[size=3][i]Necklace - [/i]Resist fire 10% and magicka fortified by 30 pts.
[i]Ring - [/i]Resist ice 45% and magicka reg by 5%[/size]

[color=#000000][b][u]7. Ritual Stone -[/u][/b][/color]
[size=3][i]Necklace -[/i] Conjuration Increased By 20 pts.Fortified magicka by 50pts and magicka reg. by 10%
[i]Ring -[/i] Soul gem charge twice as more[/size]

[b][u][color=#000000]8. Serpent Stone -[/color][/u][/b]
[size=3][i]Necklace - [/i]Resistance to Poison 100%
[i]Ring -[/i] Waterbreathing and muffled movement.
[/size]
[b][u][color=#000000]9. Shadow Stone -[/color][/u][/b]
[size=3][i]Necklace - [/i]Fire Resistance 25% and Light Armor Increased By 50 pts
[i]Ring - [/i]Ice Resistance 25% and heavy armor Increased by 50 Pts
[/size]
[color=#000000][u][b]10. Steed Stone - [/b][/u][/color]
[size=3][i]Necklace - [/i]Archery And Illusion fortified by 50pts
[i]Ring -[/i] Carry Qapacity by 50pts[/size]

[u][b][color=#000000]11. Tower Stone - [/color][/b][/u]
[size=3][i]Necklace - [/i]Increased Lockpick,Sneak by 50pts
[i]Ring - [/i]Inccreased Smithing SKill by 50pts And resistance to disease 50%[/size]

[color=#000000][u][b]12. Warrior Stone - [/b][/u][/color]
[size=3][i]Necklace - [/i] Increased Stamina Reg 100%,Increased Health 10 pts. Ressistance to magic 5%  
[i]Ring - [/i] Heavy Armor 50,Two Handed Increased by 25 pts 
[/size]

[i][color=#00ff00][size=3]All credits for excellent work on jewelry look goes to [/size][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8361/]lautasantenni[/url][/size][/color][/i]
author: ibrica_orahovac
